title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Nov 27 2021
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Nov 27 2021
description:
Clay and Buck "want to commend" Tucker Carlson for a revealing Kyle Rittenhouse first TV interview. Buck: "If Biden had any honor, if he was the good guy Joe from Scranton with rolled-up sleeves… he would apologize like a real man for what he said about Kyle Rittenhouse." How many journalists have come forward and admitted their coverage of Rittenhouse was lies? Zero. Clay: If half of mechanics or plumbers disappeared it would be a major issue; if half of journalists did, not so much. C&B respond to MSNBC's Joe Scarborough ripping the "fascist right" for making Rittenhouse a hero. Stephen Colbert is neither a "legal expert" nor a comedian. Soros-backed liberal prosecutors are the reason for the record-high spike in crime. What the heck is going on in San Francisco? Larry Kudlow on inflation: "It will get worse." The Democratic brand is broken and the infrastructure bill isn’t fixing it. Brit Hume (who C&B say is usually very even-keeled) says Biden is clearly deteriorating and clearly senile.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Clay and Buck "want to commend" Tucker Carlson for a revealing Kyle Rittenhouse first TV interview. Buck: "If Biden had any honor, if he was the good guy Joe from Scranton with rolled-up sleeves… he would apologize like a real man for what he said about Kyle Rittenhouse." How many journalists have come forward and admitted their coverage of Rittenhouse was lies? Zero. Clay: If half of mechanics or plumbers disappeared it would be a major issue; if half of journalists did, not so much. C&B respond to MSNBC's Joe Scarborough ripping the "fascist right" for making Rittenhouse a hero. Stephen Colbert is neither a "legal expert" nor a comedian. Soros-backed liberal prosecutors are the reason for the record-high spike in crime. What the heck is going on in San Francisco? Larry Kudlow on inflation: "It will get worse." The Democratic brand is broken and the infrastructure bill isn’t fixing it. Brit Hume (who C&B say is usually very even-keeled) says Biden is clearly deteriorating and clearly senile.
